Package app.backend

Class BackendManager

java.lang.Object
app.backend.BackendManager
public final class BackendManager extends Object
This BackendManager is the principal class of the BackHand. Thanks to this class the frontEnd can get the access to all the non-graphic functioms of the program.

    • loadFromFiles

      public static boolean loadFromFiles() throws FileNotFoundException, org.json.JSONException
      Loads the dynasties from the already existing files.
      Returns:
      true if the Files actually exists.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case the file doesn't exists.
      org.json.JSONException - in case the JSON file is empty or corrupted.
